title: CI Regression: 7 tests failed
issue: CI failed with 7 test regressions after TKT-006 changes. The middleware redirect fix appears to have broken existing tests.

options.label: Fix the regression — Create continuation ticket for agent to fix the broken tests
Tests are wrong — The old tests were incorrect, update them
Expand scope — Add failing test files to files_to_modify
Escalate to human — Too complex for agent to fix

recommendation: Option 1 — Agent should fix the code to not break existing tests

blocker_context.notes: 1 test file failed with 7 test failures. Check dashboard tests for middleware-related failures.
